original_text: And Ham, the father of Canaan, saw the nakedness of his father, and told his two brethren without.
korean_text: 가나안의 아버지 함이 그의 아버지의 하체를 보고 밖으로 나가서 그의 두 형제에게 알리매

sentences.original_text: And Ham, the father of Canaan,
saw the nakedness of his father,
and told his two brethren without.
